short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leave a comment or see what others have to say about any website that you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🍵 Jasmine is a simple, free extension that allows you to post comments for a website. This allows people to understand the quality and public opinion of a website or to express their own thoughts and reviews. 

✨ Enhance your browsing experience whether you are doing research, shopping, or using social media!

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————

🗝️ Key Features: 
 - View a website's comments
 - Post an anonymous comment 
 - Create an account to post and like comments
 - View and submit a rating for a website

🪄 NEW FEATURES:
 - Sort comments by most liked or top comments
 - Post comments anonymously without creating an account
